trans-unit.source: Represents a user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: Representa un usuario o grupo de usuarios a los que se concede acceso al contenido con derechos administrados.

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser> is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Como ocurre con otros <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> tipos, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser> es solo se puede usar en aplicaciones de plena confianza.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> property to assign a variable of this type.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo usar <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Owner%2A> propiedad para asignar una variable de este tipo.

trans-unit.source: The user or group name.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del usuario o grupo.

trans-unit.source: The method for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Método de autenticación.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" />.

trans-unit.source: The user or group `name` is often in the form of an individual email address (such as johndoe@contoso.com) or an email distribution list (such as marketing@contoso.com).
trans-unit.target: El usuario o grupo `name` suele ser en forma de una dirección de correo electrónico (como johndoe@contoso.com) o una lista de distribución de correo electrónico (como marketing@contoso.com).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this constructor to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar este constructor para crear un entorno seguro.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the "Anyone" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una instancia del rol de <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> "Anyone".

trans-unit.source: An instance of the "Anyone" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: Instancia del rol de <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> "Anyone".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AnyoneUser%2A> has <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Anyone".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AnyoneUser%2A> tiene <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" y <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Cualquiera".

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" with <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Anyone" is granted rights during publishing, the authentication server will issue a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to any request and will attach the license to the requesting user.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" con <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Cualquiera" se le conceden derechos durante la publicación, el servidor de autenticación emitirá un <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> a cualquier solicitud y asociará la licencia para el usuario solicitante.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> especificado para el constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> que se ha especificado para el constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" />.

trans-unit.source: The user instance to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de usuario cuya igualdad se va a comparar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> is equivalent to another given instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> es equivalente a otra instancia dada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> are the same for both this user and the given user; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> y <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> son iguales para este usuario y el usuario dado; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a computed hash code based on the user <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un código hash calculado basado en los valores <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> y <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> del usuario.

trans-unit.source: A hash code computed from the user <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" />.
trans-unit.target: Código hash calculado a partir de los valores <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name" /> y <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType" /> del usuario.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the user is currently authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si el usuario está actualmente autenticado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is currently authenticated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el usuario está autenticado actualmente; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" /> until authenticated.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" /> hasta que se autentica.

trans-unit.source: The given user <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> is authenticated based on the given <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El usuario determinado <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> se autentica según el determinado <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: After a user has been authenticated and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.IsAuthenticated%2A> is `true`, the user dialog and prompt to confirm authentication is no longer displayed when creating a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: Después de que se ha autenticado un usuario y <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.IsAuthenticated%2A> es `true`, el cuadro de diálogo de usuario y le pida que confirme la autenticación ya no aparece al crear un <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or group name specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre de usuario o grupo especificado para el constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" />.

trans-unit.source: The user or group name specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de usuario o grupo especificado para el constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the "Owner" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una instancia del rol de <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> "Owner".

trans-unit.source: An instance of the "Owner" <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> persona.
trans-unit.target: Instancia del rol de <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser" /> "Owner".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> has <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Owner".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> tiene <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" y <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Propietario".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> is used by the server-side templates to give special rights to the content author or publisher when the protected document is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.OwnerUser%2A> se utiliza por las plantillas de servidor para conceder derechos especiales al autor de contenido o publicador cuando se crea el documento protegido.
